block.obsidanum.chest_obsidian: Obsidian Chest of the Order of the Secret Flame
item.obsidanum.rezolv_the_tale_of_the_va: Rezolv - The tale of the vanished order
obsidanum.press_shift: Hold down [§7Shift§8]§8, to see the description
obsidanum.press_shift2: Hold down [§fShift§8]§8, to see the description
item.obsidan.description.sword:
§oA sword made from a magic-soaked alloy. The will of the owner can ignite this blade with a Secret Fire that will make the next blow deadly. 

§2Properties: §fWhen activating ancient magic, the damage to the attacked increases by 1.5 times. CD 80 sec.
item.obsidan.description.hoe:
§oA hoe from.. Well, you've already figured it out. Awakened.. Yes... she really doesn't like when the beds are overgrown.  

§2Properties: §fThe activated version of the hoe clears the area within a radius of 20 blocks from the grass. CD 10 sec.
item.obsidan.description.shovel:
§oThe shovel is shaped like an ordinary shovel, but in fact, if you want to, it will send any enemy on a long journey.

§2Properties: §fBy activating the ancient magic contained in this tool, you will be able to deliver a powerful blow to the enemy, throwing him up to the height of several blocks. CD 40 sec.
item.obsidan.description.pickaxe:
§oA pickaxe made of volcanic alloy is the dream of any miner. The flame languishing in it is able to transmute the rock into a precious diamond. 

§2Properties: §fAn activated pickaxe has a 15% chance of knocking a diamond out of a stone. CD 120 sec.
item.obsidan.description.axe:
§oAn axe made of obsidian. An axe awakened by the will can literally smash any tree into splinters. 

§2Properties: §fWhen ancient magic is activated, the axe can destroy a tree or the stems of a nezer entirely. CD 40 sec.
item.obsidian_tablet.description.crashed:
§oThe power from the ancient inscriptions disappeared, and the tablet cracked.. 
It must have been standing all this time thanks to the magic seal.
item.obsidan.description.drilling_crysta: §oThe bottle has a greenish glow. Peering into the greasy and worn glass of the vessel, you notice how this mysterious substance boils and sparkles. Turning the bottle over, you notice the label of the Alchemical Company and the composition of the potion... It was created according to the recipe of the disappeared Order of I... and it's diluted with water.
item.obsidian_tablet.description.active: §oThe power of the obsidian tear flowed into a lifeless tablet and ignited new characters that change from time to time and give new knowledge. Apparently, now you can forget about the loaded bookshelves with such a volume of information enclosed in this awakened ancient slab.
item.obsidian_tablet.description.ancient:
§oAn ancient and mysterious monument, with writings in some ancient dialect.
The letters pale with a dim light, as if they lure you to touch them... There was clearly magic involved, we must be on our guard.
item.smoldering_obsidian.description.swo:
§oThis sword is no longer sharpenable...Its blade is disfigured by smoldering lights, the pattern of which develops into an intimidating pattern capable of forcing the enemy to surrender without a fight. When you squeeze it in your hand, you feel like you are filled with anger and rage, along with the desire to split the skull of a couple of rebellious skeletons, driving the blade between their empty eye sockets. 

§2Features: §fNezer's flame gave the sword a 40% chance of igniting enemies.
item.smoldering_obsidian.description.ins:
§oThe ever-burning liquid flame damaged, but did not destroy the instrument. Sparkling sparks of the substance became one with the obsidian, dotted on the surface like stars in the firmament, and the handle was charred. You feel a pleasant warmth emanating from the working part, but touching it you get burned... The smoldering part of the edge responds to the touch with the roaring flame of the Lower World.

§2Features: §fNezer's flame gave the tool the ability to melt mined blocks, as well as a 20% chance to set fire to the enemy.
advancements.obsidanum.nether.nether_fla: Find an artifact of a forgotten cult in their fortresses
advancements.obsidanum.nether.crucible.d: Fill the crucible with infernal liquid
advancements.obsidanum.nether.instrument: Pour the contents of the crucible over the obsidian tool until it burns using the blacksmith's table
advancements.obsidanum.nether.drilling_c: Buy a bottle of drilling fluid from a traveling merchant
advancements.obsidanum.nether.bagell_fue: Extract Bagel fuel using a crystallizer
